The Short NAP: November 14th 2006

Nov 14, 2006 • Aaron Parker

Here’s a quick list of interesting NAP and Domain/Server Isolation related links for November:

  • Ian Hameroff: Come Together, Right Now: IPsec and VPN Co-Existence
  • What is ForeFront Client Security and how will it protect my enterprise from malware? (This looks like a very compelling product and NAP integration makes it look even better)
  • Simplifying IPsec Policy with the Simple Policy Update (This has been around for a while, but a requirement for Domain/Server Isolation with IPSec simplification)
  • Quarterly TechNet Briefing: NAP Overview Slides (.PPT, thanks Jeff)
